item.content:encoded:
Price: $675.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:27:13 UTC – Details)



With a 11th Generation InteI Core mobile processor, the Flex 5i touchscreen laptop gives you powerful combination of performance, connectivity, and entertainment on a thin, light computer
The IdeaPad Flex 5i lets you keep your ideas flowing – the 360⁰ hinge lets you use it in ‘Laptop’ mode for everyday computing, ‘Tent’ mode for sharing things, ‘Stand’ mode for binge-watching, or ‘Tablet’ mode for more intuitive interaction
Reduce clutter with a narrow bezel on 4 sides, IPS panel technology, and a 14″ full high-definition touchscreen
A physical shutter on the webcam ensures you keep out unwanted attention when you are concerned about your privacy
Connect with built-in WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5, 2 USB-A ports, USB-C, HDMI, card reader, and 3.5mm headphone & microphone combo jack

5

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:27:13 UTC – Details)

(4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $219.00 - $199.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:12:33 UTC – Details)



【High-Performance Processor】Beelink MINI S built-in faster 11 generation Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5095 base frequency 2.0GHz, up to 2.9 GHz. (4C/4T, 4M Cache) It runs much faster than i3-5005u, N3450, j3455, j4125, j4105 etc. chips. Loaded With 8gb DDR4 Ram, 256gb SSD, creates a very smooth experience for your visually home entertainment, streaming video, Web browsing, work, and games.
【Storage Expansion Options】The MINI S Mini Computer built-in 8 GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA/HDD in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance) and supports up to 2TB of 2.5-inch SATA HDD / SSD.
【Support 4K Dual Screen Display】The Mini Computer equipped with Intel UHD Graphics to support support 4K FPS video playback, which brings you first-class viewing .Dual HDMI allows you to connect two displays at the same time,thereby reducing waiting time and improving your work efficiency.
【Efficient Heat Dissipation & WIFI5】Beelink Mini Pc comes with quite large fan and heat sink which can keep the Mini Pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Built in WIFI 5 (802.11 b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 4.0.
【Auto Power On & Beelink Technical Support】If you want to auto power on, please send us the barcode at the bottom of the machine first, and we will send the corresponding tutorial file. All our products have obtained FCC, CE ROSH certification. We provide 1 year 7 days / 24 hours service and lifetime help with technical issues, no need to worry about quality issues, just email our customer service team.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:12:33 UTC – Details)

【High-Performance Processor】Beelink SEi8 comes with 16 GB DDR4, 500GB M.2 SSD built-in faster 8th Gen intel Coffee Lake i5-8279U, Burst Frequency up to 4.1Ghz (4C/8T) Supports 6MB Smart Cache, which can provide a very smooth experience for your visual home entertainment, streaming video, web browsing, work and games.
【Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 & 4K Dual Screen Display】The SEI8 Mini Computer is equipped with Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 to support 4K FPS video playback, you can enjoy first-class viewing experience.Dual HDMI allows you to connect two displays at the same time, thereby reducing waiting time and improving Your work efficiency.
【High Capacity & Expansion Options】The mini computer is built-in 16GB DDR4 RAM(Max 2400Mhz), which can be upgraded up to 32GB. It also comes with 500GB M.2 SSD NVME 2280,supports upgrade storage to 2TB (excluded) and via 2.5-inch HDD up to 2T (excluded).It can smoothly handle multiple tasks being performed.
【Efficient Cooling System & WIFI 5】Beelink SEi8 comes with large Fan (max speed<4500rpm) and Dual F6 pipe+heat sink which can keep the mini pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Support wifi 5(802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2, more stable and efficient , bringing you a better internet experience.
【Auto Power On & Beelink Technical Support】If you want to auto power on, please send us the barcode at the bottom of the machine first, and we will send the corresponding tutorial file. All our products have obtained FCC, CE ROSH certification. We provide 1 year 7 days / 24 hours service and lifetime help with technical issues, no need to worry about quality issues, just email our customer service team.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ◆New Upgrade – Mini pc powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 6 Core/12 Thread(3.3GHz up to 4.2GHz, L2 3MB L3 16MB Cache), Radeon Graphics 7 Core 1800MHz. Pre-installed Genuine Win 11 Pro. Which can turn your desk into a powerful workstation just by adding a keyboard and mouse. WiFi 6E(802.11ax) ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $549.00 - $519.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:01 UTC – Details)



◆New Upgrade – Mini pc powered with AMD Ryzen 5 5600H 6 Core/12 Thread(3.3GHz up to 4.2GHz, L2 3MB L3 16MB Cache), Radeon Graphics 7 Core 1800MHz. Pre-installed Genuine Win 11 Pro. Which can turn your desk into a powerful workstation just by adding a keyboard and mouse. WiFi 6E(802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.2 is faster and more stable data transmission and there is no network congestion. More wireless support, say goodbye to cluttered desktop.
◆Triple Screen Display & 4K UHD Output – AMD Radeon Graphics 6 Core 1800MHz delivers powerful graphics processing. Triple screen 4K@60Hz display output via dual HDMI and Type-C port. Enjoy super first-class picture quality and easily improve work efficiency. Fully capable of browsing the internet, using Office, Adobe PR and PS applications, 4K videos playback, etc.
◆Freely Expand Capacity – Mini computer loaded with 32GB RAM DDR4 (2666MHz). Dual channel DDR4 upgradeable to max 64GB(2 x 32GB, up to 3200MHz). And 500GB M.2 SSD NVME 2280 (upgradeable to max 2TB), reading speed up to 1900mb/s and writing speed up to 1700mb/s. Supporting up to 2TB external 2.5-inch 7mm HDD expansion (not included). Reduce latency, powerful loading and processing capabilities for a smoother experience.
◆Multi Interface Design & Meet Deeply Needs – Beelink SER4 small computer is equipped with 2*HDMI2.1 ports, 3*USB3.0 ports, 1*USB2.0 port, 1*Type-C video&data port, 1*DC Jack, 1*RJ45 1000m port, 1*3.5mm Audio Jack(HP&MIC) port. Supports Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 1000M network connectivity. The small pc also can be used for gaming and virtualization work.
◆Keep Desktop Quiet & Tidy – The size of the micro computer is only 5 x 4.5 x 1.6 inches, as palm-size, making minipc more convenient to carry. Installed the pc portable on the back of the monitor via the VESA interface to make it an all in one computer and to make the office cleaner. ABS frame, 2 copper tubes, upgraded aluminum plate and fan design also help this mini pc works better, quiet and efficient heat dissipation. Meet your daily needs for work and entertainment.

Price: $549.00 - $519.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:01 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $389.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ATOPNUC Mini PC, Powerful & Professional Mini computers.

ATOPNUC Mini computers comes with Windows 11 Pro installed.

Why choose ATOPNUC Mini PC?

-Small size only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inches, ideal portable mobile office computer.-8th Gen Intel Core i5-8279U up to 4.1Ghz, power processing multiple task.-Pre-installed Windows 11 Pro operation system, also supports Ubuntu & Linux.-16GB DDR4 & 512GB SSD, large compacity ensure running multi-tabs no lagging, don’t slow down the operation drastically, flexible expansion: RAM to 32GB maximum, SSD to 1TB maximum.-Dual 4K screen display. support connect with two 4k@30Ghz screen for multiple task handling at the same time.-Multi-Ports more function, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port.-Strong wireless 2.5Ghz+5G dual band WiFi5, 1000 Mb/s Gigabit Ethernet + bluetooth 5.0, Keyboard/Mouse connected works flawlessly.-Quiet Fan work silent, doesn’t overheat. the fan beneath the mini pc. high performance heat dissipation for the hardware.

The feature of ATOPNUC Mini desktop PC:

Specification of ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Processor Intel Coffee Lake i5 8279U (6M Cache, up to 4.1 GHz) Graphics Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 (300 MHz-1.15GHz, support 4K@60Hz) Memory 16GB, Dual-channel DDR4-2400, support DIY up to 32GB Storage 512GB (M.2 PCIE 2280 SSD), support install 1*2.5″ SATA HDD (7 mm), up to 2 TB Operating System Windows 11 Pro , also support Ubuntu & Linux Wireless Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0 & 2.5G+ 5G Dual-Band Wi-Fi Video Output 2* HDMI (4K@30Hz) Audio Output HDMI, Display Port, 3.5mm Audio Jack Gigabit Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN Power Adapter Automatics Voltage adjustment between 100 and 240V AC,50/60Hz, 65Watts(19V/3.42A) VESA Mount Included Kensington Lock Yes Interface 4*USB 3.0 ports， 1* Type-C ports, 2* HDMI port, 1* Gigabit Ethernet Port, 1* TF card reader

Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors

The Mini pc comes with Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors with 4 cores & 8 threads. base operating frequency is 2.40 GHz/s rising to a 4.10 GHz in burst mode.

Large Expandable Storage

The mini desktop computer comes with 16GB DDRS RAM expandable to 32GB maximum and 512GB NVME SSD supports 2.5 inch SSD or HDD expandable 2TB storage capacity (not included)) to expand storage.

Dual 4K@30Hz HDMI Ports

the mini desktop PC equipped with 2 HDMI ports supports 4K@30Hz dual screen display, running the 4K UHD video smooth without any issues.

High performance heat dissipation

This small form factor PC has a user-friendly and intimate design. Fan and heat sink dual boost, cooling the Mini PC when the PC runs the heavy job but a trade-off to keep the PC running efficiently without any issue.

Mini size & Power performance

The mini computers is only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inch, portable design, you can carry it anywhere, perfect mobile office pc for business. even the small pc size but the performance is powerful, parallelly used multi-tabs without any issue and playing multiple web browsing and video windows together definitely works as well.

Easy to Installation with VESA mount

The micro desktop computer shipped with VESA mount, easy to install the PC on the wall or back of the monitor or TV. saving space and convenient carry the PC to anywhere while business trips.

Multiple Application MINI PC

FAQ of the ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Q1: is the Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A: Yes, ATOPNUC mini pc comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. no need activation key.feel free to use other operating system, such as Linux, Ubuntu…

Q2: How to enter BIOS?

A: turn on the portable mini computers firstly. press and hold the ” F2 ” key until enter the BIOS.

Q3: Can i change the operation system?

A:Yes, you can change the operation to Windows 10 or Ubuntu, Linux and others by yourself or contact with us to get the update file.

Q4: How can i enable multi-screen?

A: The small pc comes with dual 4K@30Hz HDMI ports can be extended to connect to two monitors, allowing you to handle multi-task at the same time.

Q5: Is the copact pc noisy when running?

A: To cool the machine’s hardware, ATOPNUC Mini PC only produces about 30 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. silent fan and high performance for the cooling.

Kindly Notes:

Please read the User Manual carefully before using the ATOPNUC Mini PC to learn more about it.

Any questions please feel free to let us know at the first time before you use or need update the software.

Our Type-C port only data transfer, please kindly note it.

[Intel i5-8279U Mini PC with Win11 Pro] Mini computers featuring the intel i5-8279U processor, 4 cores 8 thead, 6MB Cache, Max Turbo frequency up to 4.1 Ghz, this mini computers has desktop-grade performance, efficient core able to handle multi-task, the small computer delivers high performance for a widely hom, office, gaming, business use.
[Large Storage Expansion &Quiet] Mini desktop computers comes with high speed 16GB DDR4 memory and 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, allow the computer handle the several operations at the same time, expand the capacity with M2 SSD/NVM2 SSD interface to 1TB or 2.5 inch SATA HDD up to 2TB(not included).
[Multi-Port, Fast transfer] Windows 11 mini computers equipped with 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI 1.4 ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port. , USB-C port support 10Gbps Super speed data transfer. WiFi 2.4G+5G Dual Band networking ensures stable, high-speed data transfers, even in crowded networking environments. Bluetooth 5.0 connect faster Speed, Farther Coverage.
[4K resolution and Dual Display Monitor] The micro desktop computers comes with integrated Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 in stunning 4K UHD resolution, Dual HDMI port ensure connector with two monitors, feel free to enjoy TVs and video, home theater.
[Perfect heat dissipation, Low noise] The ATOPNUC mini computer equipped with the high performance cooling fan, runs quietly cool down the mini desktop pc’s hardare to be perfectly heat dissipation.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Acer Aspire C24-1650-UA92 All-in-One Desktop PC comes with these specs: 11th Generation Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor 2.4GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 4.2GHz (8MB Smart Cache), Windows 11 Home, 23.8″ Full HD Widescreen Edge-to-Edge LED Back-lit IPS Display, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, 8GB DDR4 Memory, 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, Integrated 1.0 MP HD Webcam with 2 Stereo Microphones, Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz featuring 2×2 MU-MIMO technology 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet, Bluetooth 5.0, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers, 1 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear), 2 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 2 ports (Rear), 1 – USB 2.0 (Type A) port (bottom, reseved for RF dongle), 1 – HDMI-out Port (Rear), 1 – Ethernet RJ-45 Port, Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, 15.43 lbs. | 6.99 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (DQ.BFSAA.001)
Breaking the boundaries of performance with the Intel Core i5-1135G7 Processor – up to 4.20 GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads, 8 MB Intel Smart Cache | Intel Iris Xe Graphics
23.8″ Full HD Widescreen IPS LED Back-lit Screen | 8GB 3200MHz DDR4 Memory | 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD
Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz featuring 2×2 MU-MIMO technology | Bluetooth 5.0 | 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN
1 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear) | 2 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 2 ports (Rear) | 1 – USB 2.0 (Type A) port (bottom, reseved for RF dongle) | 1 – HDMI-out Port (Rear)
Integrated 1.0 MP HD Webcam with 2 Stereo Microphones | Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Included | Windows 11 Home

A Modern Design for the Modern World

The Aspire C24 All-in-One PC packs all the essential computing features you need into a slim, space-saving design that’s simple to use, functional and looks great on your desk. This PC features the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, Intel Iris Xe graphic and fast Wi-Fi 6 connectivity for an awesome computing experience. Enjoy a crisp and clear experience on the 23.8″ Full HD display while the impressively thin bezels give you more to look at. (Wireless Keyboard and Mouse included)

Previous page

  2. Borderless Design

    The 23.8” Full FHD borderless display let you experience clearer images and vibrant entertainment.

  3. Stand Thin, Stand Tall

    The ultrathin design saves on space and gives any room an extra touch of elegance.

Next page

1 11th Gen Intel Core i5 2 23.8″ FHD Display 3 Ultra-Thin Design

Glorious Display

See more details and sharper colors on the FHD display. With a 0.14″ narrow bezel and a screen-to-body ratio of up to 88% you get to see more of the screen at viewing angles of 178°.

Plenty of Storage

Videos, photos, music, games and applications all take up a lot of storage space but users won’t need to fear it filling up. With 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD and 8GB DDR4 Ram there’s lots of storage.

Privacy is Key

The Webcam at the top of Aspire C24 has a camera shutter that you can easily open and shut by sliding it with your finger for safeguarding your privacy when the webcam is not in use.

Ready to Assist

Effortlessly interact with Cortana while the device is in Modern Standby mode and enjoy crystal-clear audio with DTS: X audio. You can also further streamline your smart environment with Alexa to truly make your home run as smoother than ever before imagined.

ViprTech Snowstorm (AMD) Black

Specifications: CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (4-Core @ 3.7Ghz Turbo) Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 2GB RAM: 8GB DDR4 Primary Storage: 128GB M.2 SSD (Boot Drive) Secondary Storage: 500GB 7200RPM HDD NOTE:

Prebuilt gaming computer with awesome built-in RGB. This PC is not only a great entry point into PC gaming, it’s also great for everyday use, editing, day trading / crypto trading, and more!

Games tested:

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Far Cry

Grand Theft Auto V Overwatch

DoTA 2 Rocket League

Fortnite Minecraft

Roblox Team Fortress 2

League of Legends Overwatch

Although we test each build to ensure it can handle most popular games, please check the minimum specs for the specific game you want to play to make sure this computer meets those.

Insane Bootup Times

Take advantage of insanely fast bootup and loading times with the included 128GB M.2 SSD (brand/model may vary).

Built-In Gorgeous RGB Lighting

Light up your rig and showcase your internals with the ViprTech built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any true gaming PC.

Why choose us?

Affordable

Every PC is designed with affordability in mind, while preserving quality and reliability. Thus, keeping more money in your pocket.

Extensive Testing Process

Before a PC leaves our facility, it goes through a rigorous benchmarking and stress testing process, faulty or underperforming components are identified and replaced.

Made in the USA

Every one of our PCs is hand built by PC experts in the USA, providing jobs to Americans and ensuring we are able to provide the best quality systems possible.

Superior Support

We perform all technical support in-house. No more sitting on hold for hours, waiting in a call queue, or endlessly navigating through phone menu options, if you call you get a real person right away. We believe this is the only way to do it right.

System: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (3.7GHz Turbo), AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB M.2 SSD, 500GB HDD, Genuine Windows 10 Pro, RGB lighting enabled case
Showcase your internals with the built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any gaming PC and sure to make your rig stand out. Controlled via a button on the case.olled via a button on the case.
Enjoy insanely fast bootup times with the included 128GB M.2 Boot SSD, while still having plenty of storage with the 500GB secondary drive. Easily add additional storage if desired or add more DDR4 RAM (supports up to 32GB) or a dedicated GPU for even better performance
Tested to run games such as: CSGO, Far Cry, GTA V, Overwatch, DoTA 2, Rocket League, Fortnite, Minecraft, Roblox, Team Fortress 2, and many more!
Every ViprTech PC is built by hand in the USA and is stress-tested extensively before shipping. We stand behind our product and include a free 1 year warranty.

(as of Nov 29,2022 05:33:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

WHY CHOOSE OUVISLITE GK3V MINI PC?

1) Trustworthy Quality

We use Intel Celeron J4125 quad-core chip, DDR4 and M.2 SSD for more stable and smoother experience, OUVISLITE GK3V Mini PC will show you the performance of small form factor PC in all aspects.

2) Mature Mold Design

GK3V Mini PC has a high-quality appearance and compact component layout. With the unique air inlet and outlet design, it can dissipate heat more effectively. The snap-on cover design lets you view or upgrade internal components in one step.

3) 4K HD Visual Feast

Equipped with Intel Graphics 600 GPU, let’s reject monotonous color experience from now on, making home theater worthy of its name.

4) Triple Display Support

Dual HDMI plus VGA realizes the same and different display on three screens, you can expand the working space to multiple monitors, allowing you to gain a more efficient and comfortable productivity experience.

5) Energy Saving and Using Friendly

The TDP for the CPU is a very economical 10 Watts, more energy saving and low consumption. Noise tested at 35 decibels, avoiding the noise pollution of the mainframe.

Interface Details

2 x HDMI Ports1 x VGA Port2 x USB 3.0 Ports2 x USB 2.0 Ports1 x 1000Mbs LAN Port1 x 3.5mm Audio jack

OUVISLITE GK3V Mini PC Specification

Mini Desktop Computer

CPU: Intel Celeron Processor J4125

Processor Base Frequency: 2.00 GHz

Processor Burst Frequency: 2.70 GHz

Cores: 4

Threads: 4

Cache: 4MB

GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600(Up to 750Mhz)

Memory Types: 12GB DDR4

Storage Types: 256GB M.2 SSD

Faster with Intel J4125 CPU

Equiped with powerful and high cost-effective CPU, the mini pc has decent performace and better than J3455 or J4205. Run Photoshop and other office software smoothly and handle multitasking easily.

Triple Screen Display

With dual HDMI ports and a VGA port, the mini computer easily realizes three-screen simultaneous display or different display. Which will greatly doubles your productivity and Enhance your office experience.

Small but Powerful

Designed with 5.11 x 5.11 x 1.96 inch small form factor size, which is only the size of a palm. And the weight of 1.87lb, so you can take it anywhere easily. Say good bye to bukly mainframes.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q1: Already installed Windows 11 Pro?

Yes, the GK3V comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro and You are free to use other operating systems such as Linux, Ubuntu. If you are accustomed to using the Windows 10 version, please contact OUVISLITE to obtain the Windows 10 Pro system installation file.

Q2: Don’t have a product key in the box or email of the mini pc you purchased?

We have activated our Windows product key for you. Right click on the blank space to enter properties, then you can view your product key. It is not safe to send product key in the package or email. The key is already used to activate your Windows, so it cannot be used on other computers.

Q3: Is the machine noisy when running?

To cool the machine, the GK3V Mini PC only produces about 35 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. If you are bothered by machine noise, please inform OUVISLITE.

Q4: How can I enable multiscreen?

After connecting the HDMI cable or VGA cable to the screen, right-click on the desktop to enter the display settings, and then detect and identify more monitors.

Note:

To avoid waiting for system loading, please don’t connect to the network when you first use the Mini PC until you Fully entet into windows system desktop.

OUVISLITE MINI PC support other ways to extend storage:

2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD up to 2TB(Not include).Replace a M.2 SATA HDD.Add removable hard drives to expand the storage.

Storage expansion to meet your needs for storing more applications, work files, Audio files and videos.

【Meet to Sufficient Memory Storage】This mini pc achieves 12GB memory capacity with dual-channel DDR4 and comes with 256GB of storage. While ensuring cost-effective, the larger capacity brings you a better multitasking experience. Newbie friendly storage upgrade support:1)2.5 inch SATA SSD/HDD up to 2TB(not include). 2)replace the M.2 SATA SSD. Expand your applications, files, video or audio freely.
【J4125 Mini PC Windows 11 Pro】Celeron Gemini Lake J4125 Quad-Core processor with base frequency of 2.0 GHz and up to 2.7 GHz in burst. Let the minis to run multiple applications, web pages, full HD video or office software smoothly. Windows 11 preinstalled and automatically activated after connecting to the Internet, plug and play!
【Enjoy Immersive Visual Experience】The desktop computer has 2 HDMI ports and 1 VGA port for triple screen output, supporting three-screen simultaneous display or different display. The combination with HD Graphics 600 (up to 750MHz) makes work more efficient, 4K@60Hz HD brings you a visual feast. Whether you use it as a home pc or a business pc, it can meet your more personalized needs.

Anti-slip rubber feet to avoid scratching the desktop. With 5.11 x 5.11 x 1.96 inch small body, it also equiped with 2 x USB 3.0 ports, 2 x USB 2.0 ports, 1 x 1000Mbs LAN port,1 x 3.5mm Audio jack，2 x HDMI, 1 x VGA to meet diverse needs.
【OUVISLITE is Always There for You】GK3V desktop pc supports Auto Power on / Wake on LAN / PXE / RTC Wake / 7X24 Hours Operation.
